import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { postDog, getTemperaments } from "../actions"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; const DogCreate = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const temperaments = useSelector((state) => state.temperaments); const [input, setInput] = useState({ name: "", heigth: "", weigth: "", life_span: "", temperaments: [], }); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getTemperaments()); }, []); return (

); }; export default DogCreate;
